Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbalnaughts! This is my first time posting on the forums so if theres anything here that I missed then feel free to correct me.

Okay so I have a slight issue with docking a rover to the Clamp-O-Tron Docking Port.

The rover just seems to bounce off it and ive adjusted the height of the clamp that its trying to dock to and ive even had to force clip objects together to try and find the correct height but nothing seems to work.

I have by pure accident docked 3 times in total and thats via raising and lowing different leg combinations on the rover but the game seems to glitch after undocking I.E the rover seems to think its legs are still up and drivers around in odd angles.

I know ive not exactly designed the sexiest looking thing and its probably not the most function or even safe but im still playing in my early days and just trying to figure out what goes where etc

Here are some pictures to help you

(hope these work)

http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x442/Althaluss213/screenshot9.png' alt='screenshot9.png'>

On the bottom picture you'll see that the rover is parked into the docking clamp and that they are touching. if parked near the clamp, it will magneticly pull the rover closer but fail to connect.
